name: Cloudant won't share you data with third parties
title: Cloudant will not share your data with third parties or use it beyond providing its service

tosdr.tldr: They do not permit any third party or entity access to confidential information, including (without limitation) user subscription data. They only permit third party access as required to provide their services.
